common.description1: I have almost 20 years of professional experience in Software Development, working across multiple areas including Front-end, Back-end and leadership. My journey has been shaped by continuous learning and delivering real value in complex projects (taking rough problem statements and turning them into polished products from all aspects is my speciality) with an eye for good design and expertise in all parts of the stack including the frontend, backend, databases, devops and cloud.
